review: This device seemed promising but ultimately had too many problems, like it was something that was never quite finished, not quite ready, but put on the market anyway just to boost the year end financials. The biggest issue was video that froze and stuttered regularly, sometimes taking a few seconds to recover. The device would lose the Wi-Fi connection sometimes, would not log in again when the password was re-entered, and only restarting it would help. It also kept logging out of Netflix, so you had to reenter that password frequently.
